definition: to practice fraud/to cheat/to engage in corrupt practices
pros and cons/merits and drawbacks/advantages and disadvantages
to abuse one's position for personal gain (idiom)
to weigh the pros and cons (idiom)
see 徇私舞弊[xun4 si1 wu3 bi4]
to hit home on the evils of the day (idiom); fig. to hit a current political target/to hit the nub of the matter
to promote what is useful and get rid of what is harmful (idiom)

sentences.english: At the end of the paper, some construct…
sentences.chinese: 对如何兴“利”除“弊”，提出一些建设性意见。

sentences.english: But the potential benefits of supporting the resolution far outweigh the perils.
sentences.chinese: 但以色列若支持这项决议，潜在的利则远大于弊。

sentences.english: But new research is revealing the disorder can bring both profits and perils.
sentences.chinese: 但新的研究揭示出混乱失调状态同样有其利和弊。

sentences.english: But, accessing the internet is advantageous , but also has shortcoming.
sentences.chinese: 但是，上彀是有利也有弊。

sentences.english: However, the actual operation, there are still many drawbacks exist.
sentences.chinese: 但现实操作中仍有许多蠹弊存在。

sentences.english: Ade acknowledged cheating in the examination.
sentences.chinese: 艾德承认在考试中作了弊。

sentences.english: Overall, it seems that human activity harms the Earth more than it benefits it.
sentences.chinese: 总体上，对地球而言，人类的活动似乎弊多于利。

sentences.english: I believe that everything in this life has advantages and disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，在现实生活中，一切都是有利就有弊。

sentences.english: Whether it is a good idea to advertise the worship times of other churches is a matter of opinion.
sentences.chinese: 为其他教会宣传敬拜时间，是利是弊是见仁见智的事。

definition: no profit/not profitable/a hindrance/(to lend money) at no interest
pros and cons/merits and drawbacks/advantages and disadvantages
harmful and without benefit (idiom); more harm than good
to go against/to be contrary to/perverse/rebellious
minister not afraid to give forthright criticism
there is no gain without a loss (idiom)/there is no such thing as a free meal
pinyin: you3 suo3 de2 bi4 you3 suo3 shi1

definition: lit. not eating for fear of choking (idiom); fig. to cut off one's nose to spite one's face/to avoid sth essential because of a slight risk
